title.narrative: Occupied Palestinian Territories Statebuilding Grant and Results Compact 2011-15

description.narrative: This activity (Occupied Palestinian Territories Statebuilding Grant and Results Compact 2011-15) is a component of Statebuilding and Service Delivery Grant to the Palestinian Authority in the Occupied Palestinian Territories reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £154,500,000. This component benefits Occupied Palestinian Territories (OPT), and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM). , with the following implementing partners: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD). The start date is 01-08-2011 and the end date is 31-03-2016.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)
